channel.title: Requesting A Signature
channel.description:
I want a sig that has Ben Roethlisberger, Troy Polamalu and Hines Ward from the Steelers. I want the sig to be width - 450px and height - 150px. I also would like it to say "Gtech Warriors" and "Steelers" maby even the last names of the players if u can fit it on the sig.
[Moderated By Mr.Chris @ 19:43]
No buying or selling with the exception of SCAR Scripts.
People here will happily make you a signature free of charge :)

item.title: Requesting A Signature
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath.v2 Aftermath.v2
item.description:
@Aftermath.v2 wrote:

bigmac:

I WOULD Have happily made you this for you, but as there is not a single PLEASE In that, i won’t. Learn manners or i doubt anyone would make you it.

He offered to pay for it. Money > Manners.

Read full topic

item.description:
@rinn wrote:

lol…ill do it, u just gotta give me the renders of those guys u said up there.(not a steelers fan)
